title: Red Sonja
data:
{{stub}}
{{version028}}

'''Red Sonja''' is the first module for [[Dungeon Sprint]]. It places you in a maze of small, interconnected chambers filled with gold, shops, and a wide variety of unique opponents. Remembering what one can expect in each room is vital, as certain side paths are deadly to unprepared characters.

See the [[Sprint guide]] for further advice.

==Layout==
The level map for Red Sonja is:

[[File:Red Sonja level map.png]]

The dungeon map definition can be found in the source code repository<ref>https://github.com/crawl/crawl/blob/master/crawl-ref/source/dat/des/sprint/red_sonja.des</ref>
===Starting Path===
Your character starts out in the upper left corner of the map. In the next three rooms to your right you will encounter [[Ijyb]], an [[ogre]], and then [[Sigmund]]. After that you can experiment on how to proceed.
